title: For Netanyahuâ€™s Corruption Trial, Court Is Hearing From Over 300 Witnesses
description: The Israeli electorate remains divided over the former prime minister, even as his continuing trial on corruption charges has mostly dropped out of the headlines.
dc:creator: Isabel Kershner
media:credit: Amit Elkayam for The New York Times
media:description: The corruption trial of former Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu has barely figured in the current election campaign.
